items.title: We asked OpenAI’s o1 about the top AI trends in 2025 — here’s a look into our conversation
items.description: Here's what OpenAI's o1 had to say about AI trends this year. Just how many there are is a testament to AI’s general-purpose value.

items.title: DeepSeek R1’s bold bet on reinforcement learning: How it outpaced OpenAI at 3% of the cost
items.description: DeepSeek R1’s Monday release has sent shockwaves through the AI community, disrupting assumptions about what’s required to achieve cutting-edge AI per...

items.title: Why ‘prosocial AI’ must be the framework for designing, deploying and governing AI
items.description: Prosocial AI supports a hybrid future where human and machine intelligences co-evolve, guided by shared principles and grounded in truth.

items.title: Gaming comedy Mythic Quest Season 4 debuts on January 29 on Apple TV+
items.description: Season 4 of a TV show is not something I write about very often, given my focus is video games. But Season 4 of Mythic Quest is another matter.

items.title: Tech leaders respond to the rapid rise of DeepSeek
items.description: Marc Andreessen, Yann LeCunn and Mark Zuckerberg have all penned what appear to be responses to the Chinese open source model's ascent.
